name: Nova's Cube!
description:
Nova's Cube is an exciting bullet hell game that features a unique twist on classic gameplay. As players progress through the game, they are faced with increasingly difficult challenges, including more enemies, faster movement, and tougher bosses. To help players survive, the game offers a variety of guns and abilities that can be collected and upgraded in the in-game shop.

What sets Nova's Cube apart from other bullet hell games is its constantly evolving nature. With each update, the game introduces new guns, abilities, and upgrades that add even more depth and excitement to the gameplay. This means that no two playthroughs will ever be the same, and there is always a new challenge waiting for players.

The in-game shop is an essential part of Nova's Cube, as it allows players to upgrade their weapons and abilities to do more damage to enemies. This is important, as the game's difficulty ramps up quickly, and players need to be able to deal with increasingly tough enemies in order to survive.

Overall, Nova's Cube is an incredibly fun and challenging game that offers hours of gameplay for both casual and hardcore gamers alike. The game's constantly evolving nature, in-game shop, and challenging gameplay make it a must-play for anyone who loves bullet hell games. So, why not give it a try and see how long you can last? Who knows, you just might have what it takes to make it to round 100 or more.

[Developer's Note]
The game is under active development, with more UI changes on the way. We plan to listen and work with the community to actively make the game better for one and all.
We understand that some players may judge us based off how the UI looks. However for my first game I am happy with how the game is turning out and the direction the game is headed.
I plan to redo, and even remake some parts of the game but better! Please bare with me as I continue to update the game. Thank you for playing!
